mapper.select: select X.MMS_NO, X.RECV_ID, X.SENT_ID, X.MMS_CONTENT, X.SENT_DATE, X.READ_DATE, X.RECV_READ, X.RECV_DEL, X.SENT_DEL, X.PRODUCT_NO, X.recv_show, X.sent_show, X.product_name from ( select rownum as rnum, A.MMS_NO, A.RECV_ID, A.SENT_ID, A.MMS_CONTENT, A.SENT_DATE, A.READ_DATE, A.RECV_READ, A.RECV_DEL, A.SENT_DEL, A.PRODUCT_NO, A.recv_show, A.sent_show, A.product_name from ( select m.MMS_NO, m.RECV_ID, m.SENT_ID, m.MMS_CONTENT, m.SENT_DATE, m.READ_DATE, m.RECV_READ, m.RECV_DEL, m.SENT_DEL, m.PRODUCT_NO, m.RECV_SHOW, m.sent_show, p.product_name from MESSAGE m join product p on m.product_no = p.product_no order by sent_date desc) A where rownum <= (#{perPageNum} * #{page}) and recv_id = #{recv_id} and recv_del = 'N' ) x where X.rnum > #{pageStart}

select X.MMS_NO, X.RECV_ID, X.SENT_ID, X.MMS_CONTENT, X.SENT_DATE, X.READ_DATE, X.RECV_READ, X.RECV_DEL, X.SENT_DEL, X.PRODUCT_NO, X.recv_show, X.sent_show, X.product_name from ( select rownum as rnum, A.MMS_NO, A.RECV_ID, A.SENT_ID, A.MMS_CONTENT, A.SENT_DATE, A.READ_DATE, A.RECV_READ, A.RECV_DEL, A.SENT_DEL, A.PRODUCT_NO, A.recv_show, A.sent_show, A.product_name from ( select m.MMS_NO, m.RECV_ID, m.SENT_ID, m.MMS_CONTENT, m.SENT_DATE, m.READ_DATE, m.RECV_READ, m.RECV_DEL, m.SENT_DEL, m.PRODUCT_NO, m.RECV_SHOW, m.sent_show, p.product_name from MESSAGE m join product p on m.product_no = p.product_no order by sent_date desc) A where rownum <= (#{perPageNum} * #{page}) and sent_id = #{sent_id} and sent_del = 'N') x where X.rnum > #{pageStart}

select X.MMS_NO, X.RECV_ID, X.SENT_ID, X.MMS_CONTENT, X.SENT_DATE, X.READ_DATE, X.RECV_READ, X.RECV_DEL, X.SENT_DEL, X.PRODUCT_NO, X.recv_show, X.sent_show, X.product_name from ( select rownum as rnum, A.MMS_NO, A.RECV_ID, A.SENT_ID, A.MMS_CONTENT, A.SENT_DATE, A.READ_DATE, A.RECV_READ, A.RECV_DEL, A.SENT_DEL, A.PRODUCT_NO, A.recv_show, A.sent_show, A.product_name from ( select m.MMS_NO, m.RECV_ID, m.SENT_ID, m.MMS_CONTENT, m.SENT_DATE, m.READ_DATE, m.RECV_READ, m.RECV_DEL, m.SENT_DEL, m.PRODUCT_NO, m.RECV_SHOW, m.sent_show, p.product_name from MESSAGE m join product p on m.product_no = p.product_no order by sent_date desc) A where rownum <= (#{perPageNum} * #{page}) and (sent_id = #{sent_id} and sent_del = 'Y' and sent_show = 'N') or (recv_id = #{recv_id} and recv_del = 'Y' and recv_show = 'N')) x where X.rnum > #{pageStart}
mapper.insert: insert into message values( sq_mno.nextval, #{recv_id}, #{sent_id}, #{mms_content}, sysdate, default, default, default, default, 3, default, default)
mapper.select: select m.mms_no, m.sent_id, m.recv_id, m.mms_content, m.sent_date, p.product_name, m.read_date, m.recv_read from message m join product p on m.product_no = p.product_no where mms_no = #{mms_no}
